name: Response Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook outlines steps to mitigate the impact of an attacker who executed malicious PowerShell scripts to gather sensitive information.

action--6db71c4c-bb89-4921-82d5-559f0801.name: Kill malicious process
action--6db71c4c-bb89-4921-82d5-559f0801.description: Terminate the malicious PowerShell script that was executed.

action--429dfd3c-0aef-461c-afed-ad0988f7.name: Isolate affected host
action--429dfd3c-0aef-461c-afed-ad0988f7.description: Disconnect the affected host from the network to prevent further damage.

commands.command: if [ $(hostname) == 'host-12' ]; then netsh interface set interface 'Ethernet' admin=disabled; fi

loop--d590b071-8e62-4da2-9b54-5b79d2b360.name: Conduct malware scan until clean
loop--d590b071-8e62-4da2-9b54-5b79d2b360.description: Perform repeated malware scans until the system is confirmed clean.

action--d590b071-8e62-4da2-9b54-5b79d2b3.name: Conduct malware scan
action--d590b071-8e62-4da2-9b54-5b79d2b3.description: Run a malware scan on the affected host.

action--set-scan-status.name: Update scan status
action--set-scan-status.description: Check the result of the malware scan and update scan_status accordingly.

commands.command: if [ $(check_scan_result) == 'clean' ]; then scan_status='clean'; else scan_status='in_progress'; fi
